00031 class q_intelementCompare {
00032 public:
00033 
00035 
00041   bool operator()( const std::pair<double, long int> p1,  
00042                    const std::pair<double, long int> p2 ){
00043     return p1.first < p2.first;
00044   }
00045 };

00048 
00055 class qknn 
00056 {
00057 private:
00058   long unsigned int K;
00059   typedef std::pair<double, long int> q_intelement;
00060   typedef std::priority_queue<q_intelement, std::vector<q_intelement>, q_intelementCompare>  
00061   PQ;
00062   PQ pq;
00063   
00064 public:
00065   
00067 
00070   qknn(){};
00071   
00073 
00077   double topdist(void)
00078   {
00079     return pq.top().first;
00080   }
00081   
00083 
00088   void set_size(long unsigned int k)
00089   {
00090     K = k;
00091   }
00092   
00093   bool is_element(double dist, long int p)
00094   {
00095   }
00097 
00101   long int top()
00102   {
00103     return pq.top().second;
00104   }
00105 
00107 
00113   bool update(double dist, long int p)
00114   {
00115     if(size() < K)
00116       {
00117         q_intelement tq(dist, p);
00118         pq.push(tq);
00119         return true;
00120       }
00121     else if(topdist() > dist)
00122       {
00123         pq.pop();
00124         q_intelement tq(dist, p);
00125         pq.push(tq);
00126         return true;
00127       }
00128     return false;
00129   }
00130   
00132 
00136   void answer(std::vector<long unsigned int>& pl)
00137   {
00138     std::vector<long unsigned int>::size_type i;
00139     pl.resize(K);
00140     i=pl.size();
00141     do
00142       {
00143         --i;
00144         pl[i] = pq.top().second;
00145         pq.pop();
00146       }
00147     while(i != 0);
00148   };
00150 
00156   void answer(std::vector<long unsigned int>& pl, std::vector<double> &pd)
00157   {
00158     pl.resize(K);
00159     pd.resize(K);
00160     std::vector<long unsigned int>::size_type i;
00161     i = pl.size();
00162     do
00163       {
00164         --i;
00165         pl[i] = pq.top().second;
00166         pd[i] = pq.top().first;
00167         pq.pop();
00168       }
00169     while(i != 0);
00170   }
00172 
00176    long unsigned int size(){ return pq.size(); }
00177 };
